arts.ttl: Real Madrid fans send clear message to Arsenal after what Rodrygo did against Al-Hilal at Club World Cup
arts.sum: He didn't make the greatest impact...

arts.ttl: Thibaut Courtois Speaks Out On Trent Alexander-Arnold’s Real Madrid Debut After Al-Hilal Draw
arts.sum: Trent Alexander-Arnold made his Real Madrid debut against Al-Hilal in the FIFA Club World Cup opener on June 18. Two players, though, made their debuts for the club in Alexander-Arnold and Dean Huijsen, and Los Blancos goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois shared his verdict following the game.

arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Post Match Press Conference After Real Madrid vs Al-Hilal Club World Cup Draw
arts.sum: The first half wasn't very good but we have to take the positives and look at how we can learn from the negatives. Alonso addressed the media after the game via Real Madrid .

arts.ttl: Trent, Huijsen decisions made: Are defensive duo in Real Madrid XI vs. Al-Hilal?
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Xabi Alonso names both Trent Alexander-Arnold and Dean Huijsen in his starting side for Wednesday's Club World Cup contest with Al-Hilal.

arts.ttl: Trent debuts as Real Madrid are held by Al-Hilal in Club World Cup
arts.sum: Real Madrid open their Club World Cup challenge with a 1-1 draw against Al-Hilal on Wednesday in a match which saw both Trent Alexander-Arnold and Dean Huijsen debut.

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold opens up on Real Madrid debut and reveals what Xabi Alonso told the team at half-time as Spanish giants are held by Al-Hilal at Club World Cup
arts.sum: AADAM PATEL IN MIAMI: Madrid were held to a 1-1 draw by Saudi Arabian side Al-Hilal in Miami, with the former Liverpool man playing 65 minutes before he was replaced by Lucas Vasquez.

arts.ttl: Photo: Xabi Alonso comforts Real Madrid star after costly penalty miss vs Al-Hilal
arts.sum: New Real Madrid head coach Xabi Alonso was spotted consoling a leading member of his squad, on the back of the club’s meeting with Al-Hilal. This comes after the player…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid wilt in Miami heat as Al-Hilal steal thunder from Trent Alexander-Arnold’s debut
arts.sum: Real Madrid 1-1 Al-Hilal: Alexander-Arnold’s debut for Real Madrid ended after 65 minutes as the Galacticos were held to a draw

arts.ttl: Real Madrid 1-1 Al Hilal: Report & Full Match Highlights As Valverde Misses Late Penalty At Club World Cup
arts.sum: Los Blancos took the lead through Gonzalo Garcia in Xabi Alonso's first game as coach, but a Ruben Neves penalty levelled the group game. Al Hilal started the game in a much more lively fashion than Real Madrid, with the first clear chance coming when Marcos Leonardo's shot flashed wide from close range after less than 10 minutes.

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold Underwhelms in Real Madrid Debut: Takeaways From Draw vs. Al Hilal
arts.sum: Los Blancos got on the scoresheet in the 34th minute after Rodrygo linked up with Real Madrid Castilla product Gonzalo García on the counter attack. Real Madrid had the opportunity to win the match in the second half, but Fede Valverde's penalty was saved by Bono.
